trans-unit.source: Describes a color in terms of alpha, red, green, and blue channels.
trans-unit.target: 从 alpha、红色、绿色和蓝色通道角度描述一种颜色。

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML 属性用法

trans-unit.source: XAML Values
trans-unit.target: XAML 值

trans-unit.source: *predefinedColor*
trans-unit.target: *predefinedColor*

trans-unit.source: One of the colors predefined by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Colors> class.
trans-unit.target: 一种颜色由预定义<xref:System.Windows.Media.Colors>类。

trans-unit.source: *rgb*
trans-unit.target: *rgb*

trans-unit.source: A three-digit hexadecimal number.
trans-unit.target: 三个数字的十六进制数。

trans-unit.source: The first digit specifies the color's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A> value, the second digit specifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A> value, and the third digit specifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: 第一个数字指定的颜色<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A>值，第二个数字指定<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A>值，且第三个数字，则指定<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A>值。

trans-unit.source: For example, `00F`.
*argb*
trans-unit.target: *argb*

trans-unit.source: A four-digit hexadecimal number.
trans-unit.target: 四位的十六进制数字。

trans-unit.source: The first digit specifies the color's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A> value, the second digit specifies its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A> value, the next digit specifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A> value, and the final digit specifies its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: 第一个数字指定的颜色<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A>值，第二个数字指定其<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A>值下, 一步的数字指定<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A>值，且最后一个数字，则指定其<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A>值。

trans-unit.source: For example, `F00F`.
trans-unit.target: 例如 `F00F`。

trans-unit.source: *rrggbb*
trans-unit.target: *rrggbb*

trans-unit.source: A six-digit hexadecimal number.
trans-unit.target: 六位数的十六进制数。

trans-unit.source: The first two digits specify the color's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A> value, the next two specify its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A> value, and the final two specify its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: 前两个数字指定的颜色<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A>值，后面的两个指定其<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A>值和最终的两个指定其<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A>值。

trans-unit.source: For example, `0000FF`.
*aarrggbb*
trans-unit.target: *aarrggbb*

trans-unit.source: An eight-digit hexadecimal number.
trans-unit.target: 八位十六进制数字。

trans-unit.source: The first two digits specify the color's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A> value, the next two specify its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A> value, the next two specify its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A> value, and the final two specify its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: 前两个数字指定的颜色<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A>值，后面的两个指定其<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A>值，后面的两个指定其<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A>值和最终的两个指定其<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A>值。

trans-unit.source: For example, `FF0000FF`.
trans-unit.target: 例如 `FF0000FF`。

trans-unit.source: *scA*
trans-unit.target: *scA*

trans-unit.source: The color's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScA%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: 颜色的<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScA%2A>值。

trans-unit.source: *scR*
trans-unit.target: *scR*

trans-unit.source: The color's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScR%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: 颜色的<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScR%2A>值。

trans-unit.source: *scG*
trans-unit.target: *scG*

trans-unit.source: The color's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScG%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: 颜色的<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScG%2A>值。

trans-unit.source: *scB*
trans-unit.target: *scB*

trans-unit.source: The color's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScB%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: 颜色的<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScB%2A>值。

trans-unit.source: *profileUri*
trans-unit.target: *profileUri*

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icc](~/includes/tlasharptla-icc-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icm](~/includes/tlasharptla-icm-md.md)] color profile.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icc](~/includes/tlasharptla-icc-md.md)]或[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icm](~/includes/tlasharptla-icm-md.md)]颜色配置文件。

trans-unit.source: *alphaValue*
trans-unit.target: *alphaValue*

trans-unit.source: The alpha channel color value.
trans-unit.target: Alpha 通道颜色值。

trans-unit.source: The value range is 0.0 to 1.0.
trans-unit.target: 值范围是 0.0 到 1.0 之间。

trans-unit.source: *colorValue*
trans-unit.target: *colorValue*

trans-unit.source: A comma-delimited list of three to eight values that represent the color channels of the color profile.
trans-unit.target: 以逗号分隔的列表，表示的颜色配置文件的颜色通道的三到 8 个值。

trans-unit.source: The value range is 0.0 to 1.0.
trans-unit.target: 值范围是 0.0 到 1.0 之间。

trans-unit.source: This example shows how to use sRGB, ScRGB, and color profile values to create the color blue.
trans-unit.target: 此示例演示如何使用 sRGB、 ScRGB 和颜色配置文件值创建颜色为蓝色。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see langword="sRGB" /> alpha channel value of the color.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置颜色的 <see langword="sRGB" /> alpha 通道值。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="sRGB" /> alpha channel value of the color, a value between 0 and 255.
trans-unit.target: 颜色的 <see langword="sRGB" /> Alpha 通道值，介于 0 到 255 之间。

trans-unit.source: The alpha channel of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> structure determines the amount of transparency the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> has.
trans-unit.target: Alpha 通道<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color>结构确定透明度量<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color>具有。

trans-unit.source: An alpha value of 255 indicates the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> is completely opaque and a value of 0 indicates the color is completely transparent.
trans-unit.target: 为 255 的 alpha 值指示<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color>完全不透明的 0 值表示的颜色是完全透明。

trans-unit.source: The `sRGB` channels (<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A>) and the ScRGB channels (<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScA%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScR%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScG%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScB%2A>) of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> structure are synchronized properties.
trans-unit.target: `sRGB`通道 (<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A>) 和 ScRGB 通道 (<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScA%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScR%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScG%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScB%2A>) 的<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color>同步结构属性。

trans-unit.source: For example, when <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A>, the `sRGB` alpha channel, is modified, the `ScRGB` alpha channel, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScA%2A>, is converted to the equivalent value using the 0-1 range that the `Sc` scheme supports.
trans-unit.target: 例如，当<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A>、`sRGB`修改 alpha 通道， `ScRGB` alpha 通道， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScA%2A>，转换为等效于使用 0-1 的值范围`Sc`方案支持。

trans-unit.source: The first <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> structure to add.
trans-unit.target: 要相加的第一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> 结构。

trans-unit.source: The second <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> structure to add.
trans-unit.target: 要相加的第二个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> 结构。

trans-unit.source: Adds two <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> structures.
trans-unit.target: 将两个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> 结构相加。

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> structure whose color values are the results of the addition operation.
trans-unit.target: 一个新的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> 结构，其颜色值是加法运算的结果。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> structures are added together by adding the alpha, red, green, and blue channels of the first color to the alpha, red, green, and blue channels of the second color.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> 通过将第一种颜色的 alpha、 红色、 绿色和蓝色通道添加到第二种颜色的 alpha、 红色、 绿色和蓝色通道，结构加在一起。

trans-unit.source: For example, the alpha channel of `color1` and the alpha channel of `color2` are added together to produce the alpha channel of the resulting color.
trans-unit.target: 例如的 alpha 通道`color1`和的 alpha 通道`color2`添加在一起以产生所生成的颜色的 alpha 通道。

trans-unit.source: The same is done with the red, green, and blue channels to produce the red, green, and blue channels of the new color.
trans-unit.target: 相同是使用要生成新的颜色的红色、 绿色和蓝色通道的红色、 绿色和蓝色通道进行。

trans-unit.source: The first color to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比较的第一种颜色。

trans-unit.source: The second color to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比较的第二种颜色。

trans-unit.source: Compares two <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> structures for fuzzy equality.
trans-unit.target: 比较两个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> 结构是否模糊相等。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="color1" /> and <paramref name="color2" /> are nearly identical; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="color1" /> 与 <paramref name="color2" /> 基本上相同，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This equality method compensates for the fact that floating-point values can acquire a small amount of error when operated upon.
trans-unit.target: 此相等方法补偿浮点值，可以获取少量的错误运算时的事实。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see langword="sRGB" /> blue channel value of the color.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置颜色的 <see langword="sRGB" /> 蓝色通道值。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="sRGB" /> blue channel value of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> structure, a value between 0 and 255.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> 结构的 <see langword="sRGB" /> 蓝色通道值，介于 0 到 255 之间。

trans-unit.source: The `sRGB` channels (<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A>) and the `ScRGB` channels (<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScA%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScR%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScG%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScB%2A>) of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> structure are synchronized properties.
trans-unit.target: `sRGB`通道 (<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A>) 和`ScRGB`通道 (<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScA%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScR%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScG%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScB%2A>) 的<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color>结构不是同步的属性。

trans-unit.source: For example, when <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A>, the `sRGB` blue channel, is modified, the `ScRGB` blue channel, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScB%2A>, is converted to the equivalent value using the 0-1 range that the `Sc` scheme supports.
trans-unit.target: 例如，当<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A>、`sRGB`蓝色通道，将修改，`ScRGB`蓝色通道<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScB%2A>，转换为等效于使用 0-1 的值范围`Sc`方案支持。

trans-unit.source: Sets the <see langword="ScRGB" /> channels of the color to within the gamut of 0 to 1, if they are outside that range.
trans-unit.target: 如果颜色的 <see langword="ScRGB" /> 通道不在 0 到 1 的范围内，请将它们设置在此范围内。

trans-unit.source: The gamut of the `ScRGB` color space is larger than the clamp range, so the use of this method may result in the loss of color information.
trans-unit.target: 色域`ScRGB`颜色空间大于限制范围，因此使用此方法可能导致的颜色信息丢失。

trans-unit.source: Gets the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icc](~/includes/tlasharptla-icc-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icm](~/includes/tlasharptla-icm-md.md)] color profile of the color.
trans-unit.target: 获取颜色的 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icc](~/includes/tlasharptla-icc-md.md)] 或 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icm](~/includes/tlasharptla-icm-md.md)] 颜色配置文件。

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icc](~/includes/tlasharptla-icc-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icm](~/includes/tlasharptla-icm-md.md)] color profile of the color.
trans-unit.target: 颜色的 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icc](~/includes/tlasharptla-icc-md.md)] 或 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icm](~/includes/tlasharptla-icm-md.md)] 颜色配置文件。

trans-unit.source: A [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icc](~/includes/tlasharptla-icc-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icm](~/includes/tlasharptla-icm-md.md)] color profile contains a color system profile for a particular application or device such as a color printer.
trans-unit.target: A[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icc](~/includes/tlasharptla-icc-md.md)]或[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icm](~/includes/tlasharptla-icm-md.md)]颜色配置文件包含特定应用程序或颜色打印机等设备的颜色系统配置文件。

trans-unit.source: This profile is matched to a common profile that in turn can be mapped to the individual profiles of other devices.
trans-unit.target: 此配置文件符合反过来可映射到单独的配置文件的其他设备的公共配置文件。

trans-unit.source: This allows the color system used by one computer device to match the colors from other applications and devices on the same or other computer systems.
trans-unit.target: 这样一台计算机设备用于匹配其他应用程序和设备在相同或其他计算机系统上的颜色的颜色系统。

trans-unit.source: Tests whether two <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> structures are identical.
trans-unit.target: 测试两个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> 结构是否相同。

trans-unit.source: The object to compare to this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: 与此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> 结构进行比较的对象。

trans-unit.source: Tests whether the specified object is a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> structure and is equivalent to this color.
trans-unit.target: 测试指定的对象是否为 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> 结构并等同于当前颜色。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified object is a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> structure and is identical to the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> structure; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的对象是 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> 结构并与当前的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> 结构相同，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Floating-point values can acquire a small degree of error when they are operated upon.
trans-unit.target: 这些运算时，浮点值可以获取轻微的错误。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.Equals%2A> method, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.op_Equality%2A> operator, and the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.op_Inequality%2A> operator do not compensate for this and thus may not return the expected Boolean result.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.Equals%2A>方法，<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.op_Equality%2A>运算符，与<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.op_Inequality%2A>运算符不弥补这并因此可能不会返回预期的布尔值结果。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.AreClose%2A> method uses a fuzzy equality algorithm that compensates for this floating-point arithmetic error by returning `true` for a comparison of two <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> structures that are practically identical, but whose values may differ by a minuscule amount.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.AreClose%2A>方法使用此浮点算术错误补偿通过返回的模糊相等算法`true`有关的两个比较<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color>几乎相同，但其值可能因而异的结构少量。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> structure to compare to the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: 要与当前 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> 结构进行比较的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> 结构。

trans-unit.source: Tests whether the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> structure is identical to this color.
trans-unit.target: 测试指定的对象是否为 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> 结构并与当前颜色完全相同。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> structure is identical to the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> structure; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> 结构与当前的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> 结构相同，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The first <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> structure to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比较的第一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> 结构。

trans-unit.source: The second <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> structure to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比较的第二个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> 结构。

trans-unit.source: Tests whether two <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> structures are identical.
trans-unit.target: 测试两个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> 结构是否相同。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="color1" /> and <paramref name="color2" /> are exactly identical; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="color1" /> 与 <paramref name="color2" /> 完全相同，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Floating-point values can acquire a small degree of error when they are operated upon.
trans-unit.target: 这些运算时，浮点值可以获取轻微的错误。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.Equals%2A> method, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.op_Equality%2A> operator, and the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.op_Inequality%2A> operator do not compensate for this and thus may not return the expected Boolean result.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.Equals%2A>方法，<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.op_Equality%2A>运算符，与<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.op_Inequality%2A>运算符不弥补这并因此可能不会返回预期的布尔值结果。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.AreClose%2A> method uses a fuzzy equality algorithm that compensates for this floating-point arithmetic error by returning `true` for a comparison of two <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> structures that are practically identical, but whose values may differ by a minuscule amount.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.AreClose%2A>方法使用此浮点算术错误补偿通过返回的模糊相等算法`true`有关的两个比较<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color>几乎相同，但其值可能因而异的结构少量。

trans-unit.source: The alpha channel, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Color.A" />, of the new color.
trans-unit.target: 新颜色的 Alpha 通道 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Color.A" />。

trans-unit.source: The red channel, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Color.R" />, of the new color.
trans-unit.target: 新颜色的红色通道 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Color.R" />。

trans-unit.source: The green channel, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Color.G" />, of the new color.
trans-unit.target: 新颜色的绿色通道 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Color.G" />。

trans-unit.source: The blue channel, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Color.B" />, of the new color.
trans-unit.target: 新颜色的蓝色通道 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Color.B" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> structure by using the specified <see langword="sRGB" /> alpha channel and color channel values.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see langword="sRGB" /> Alpha 通道和颜色通道值创建一个新的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> 结构。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> structure with the specified values.
trans-unit.target: 具有指定值的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> 结构。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.FromArgb%2A> method allows you to specify the alpha channel; the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.FromRgb%2A> method uses a default value of 255 for the alpha channel.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.FromArgb%2A>方法允许你指定的 alpha 通道;<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.FromRgb%2A>方法使用的默认值为 255 的 alpha 通道。

trans-unit.source: The alpha channel of a color determines the amount of transparency of the color.
trans-unit.target: 一种颜色的 alpha 通道确定颜色的透明度的量。

trans-unit.source: An alpha value of 255 indicates that the color is completely opaque, and a value of 0 indicates that the color is completely transparent.
trans-unit.target: 255 的 alpha 值表示的颜色是完全不透明，值为 0 表示的颜色是完全透明。

trans-unit.source: The alpha channel for the new color,a value between 0 and 1.
trans-unit.target: 颜色的 Alpha 通道值，该值介于 0 和 1 之间。

trans-unit.source: A collection of values that specify the color channels for the new color.
trans-unit.target: 一个值集合，其中的值指定新颜色的颜色通道。

trans-unit.source: These values map to the <c>profileUri</c>.
trans-unit.target: 这些值映射到 <c>profileUri</c>。

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icc](~/includes/tlasharptla-icc-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icm](~/includes/tlasharptla-icm-md.md)] color profile for the new color.
trans-unit.target: 新颜色的 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icc](~/includes/tlasharptla-icc-md.md)] 或 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icm](~/includes/tlasharptla-icm-md.md)] 颜色配置文件。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> structure by using the specified alpha channel, color channel values, and color profile.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 Alpha 通道、颜色通道值和颜色配置文件创建一个新的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> 结构。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> structure with the specified values.
trans-unit.target: 具有指定值的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> 结构。

trans-unit.source: A [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icc](~/includes/tlasharptla-icc-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icm](~/includes/tlasharptla-icm-md.md)] color profile contains a color system profile for a particular application or device such as a color printer.
trans-unit.target: A[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icc](~/includes/tlasharptla-icc-md.md)]或[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icm](~/includes/tlasharptla-icm-md.md)]颜色配置文件包含特定应用程序或颜色打印机等设备的颜色系统配置文件。

trans-unit.source: This profile is matched to a common profile that in turn can be mapped to the individual profiles of other devices.
trans-unit.target: 此配置文件符合反过来可映射到单独的配置文件的其他设备的公共配置文件。

trans-unit.source: This allows the color system used by one computer device to match the colors from other applications and devices on the same or other computer systems.
trans-unit.target: 这样一台计算机设备用于匹配其他应用程序和设备在相同或其他计算机系统上的颜色的颜色系统。

trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.FromAValues%2A>方法来创建<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color>结构。

trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see langword="sRGB" /> 颜色通道值创建一个新的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> 结构。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.FromArgb%2A> method allows you to specify the alpha channel; the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.FromRgb%2A> method uses a default value of 1 for the alpha channel.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.FromArgb%2A>方法允许你指定的 alpha 通道;<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.FromRgb%2A>方法为 alpha 通道使用默认值为 1。

trans-unit.source: The alpha channel of a color determines the amount of transparency of the color.
trans-unit.target: 一种颜色的 alpha 通道确定颜色的透明度的量。

trans-unit.source: An alpha value of 1 indicates that the color is completely opaque, and a value of 0 indicates that the color is completely transparent.
trans-unit.target: Alpha 值为 1 表示的颜色是完全不透明，值为 0 表示的颜色是完全透明。

trans-unit.source: The sRGB channels (<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A>) and the ScRGB channels (<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScA%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScR%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScG%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScB%2A>) of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> structure are synchronized properties.
trans-unit.target: SRGB 通道 (<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A>) 和 ScRGB 通道 (<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScA%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScR%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScG%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScB%2A>) 的<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color>结构不是同步的属性。

trans-unit.source: For example, when <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A>, the sRGB red channel, is modified the ScRGB red channel, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScR%2A>, is transformed to the equivalent value.
trans-unit.target: 例如，当<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A>，sRGB 红色通道中，修改 ScRGB 红色通道， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScR%2A>，转换为等效的值。

trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.FromRgb%2A>方法来创建<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color>结构。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="ScRGB" /> alpha channel, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScA" />, of the new color.
trans-unit.target: 新颜色的 <see langword="ScRGB" /> Alpha 通道 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScA" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="ScRGB" /> red channel, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScR" />, of the new color.
trans-unit.target: 新颜色的 <see langword="ScRGB" /> 红色通道 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScR" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="ScRGB" /> green channel, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScG" />, of the new color.
trans-unit.target: 新颜色的 <see langword="ScRGB" /> 绿色通道 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScG" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="ScRGB" /> blue channel, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScB" />, of the new color.
trans-unit.target: 新颜色的 <see langword="ScRGB" /> 蓝色通道 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScB" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> structure by using the specified <see langword="ScRGB" /> alpha channel and color channel values.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see langword="ScRGB" /> Alpha 通道和颜色通道值创建一个新的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> 结构。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> structure with the specified values.
trans-unit.target: 具有指定值的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> 结构。

trans-unit.source: The alpha channel of a color determines the amount of transparency of the color.
trans-unit.target: 一种颜色的 alpha 通道确定颜色的透明度的量。

trans-unit.source: An alpha value of 1 indicates that the color is completely opaque, and a value of 0 indicates that the color is completely transparent.
trans-unit.target: Alpha 值为 1 表示的颜色是完全不透明，值为 0 表示的颜色是完全透明。

trans-unit.target: 一个值集合，其中的值指定新颜色的颜色通道。

trans-unit.source: These values map to the <c>profileUri</c>.
trans-unit.target: 这些值映射到 <c>profileUri</c>。

trans-unit.target: 新颜色的 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icc](~/includes/tlasharptla-icc-md.md)] 或 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icm](~/includes/tlasharptla-icm-md.md)] 颜色配置文件。

trans-unit.target: 使用指定的颜色通道值和颜色配置文件创建一个新的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> 结构。

trans-unit.target: 具有指定值且 Alpha 通道值为 1 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> 结构。

trans-unit.source: A [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icc](~/includes/tlasharptla-icc-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icm](~/includes/tlasharptla-icm-md.md)] color profile contains a color system profile for a particular application or device such as a color printer.
trans-unit.target: A[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icc](~/includes/tlasharptla-icc-md.md)]或[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icm](~/includes/tlasharptla-icm-md.md)]颜色配置文件包含特定应用程序或颜色打印机等设备的颜色系统配置文件。

trans-unit.source: This profile is matched to a common profile that in turn can be mapped to the individual profiles of other devices.
trans-unit.target: 此配置文件符合反过来可映射到单独的配置文件的其他设备的公共配置文件。

trans-unit.source: This allows the color system used by one computer device to match the colors from other applications and devices on the same or other computer systems.
trans-unit.target: 这样一台计算机设备用于匹配其他应用程序和设备在相同或其他计算机系统上的颜色的颜色系统。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.FromValues%2A> method to create a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> structure.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.FromValues%2A>方法来创建<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color>结构。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see langword="sRGB" /> green channel value of the color.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置颜色的 <see langword="sRGB" /> 绿色通道值。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="sRGB" /> green channel value of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> structure, a value between 0 and 255.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> 结构的 <see langword="sRGB" /> 绿色通道值，介于 0 到 255 之间。

trans-unit.source: The `sRGB` channels (<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A>) and the `ScRGB` channels (<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScA%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScR%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScG%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScB%2A>) of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> structure are synchronized properties.
trans-unit.target: `sRGB`通道 (<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A>) 和`ScRGB`通道 (<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScA%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScR%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScG%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScB%2A>) 的<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color>结构不是同步的属性。

trans-unit.source: For example, when <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A>, the `sRGB` green channel, is modified, the `ScRGB` green channel, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScG%2A>, is converted to the equivalent value using the 0-1 range that the `Sc` scheme supports.
trans-unit.target: 例如，当<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A>、`sRGB`绿色通道，将修改，`ScRGB`绿色通道<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScG%2A>，转换为等效于使用 0-1 的值范围`Sc`方案支持。

trans-unit.source: Gets a hash code for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: 获取此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> 结构的哈希代码。

trans-unit.source: A hash code for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: 此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> 结构的哈希代码。

trans-unit.source: Gets the color channel values of the color.
trans-unit.target: 获取颜色的颜色通道值。

trans-unit.source: An array of color channel values.
trans-unit.target: 颜色通道值的数组。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> to be multiplied.
trans-unit.target: 作为被乘数的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" />。

trans-unit.source: The value to multiply by.
trans-unit.target: 要相乘的值。

trans-unit.source: Multiplies the alpha, red, blue, and green channels of the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> structure by the specified value.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> 结构的 Alpha、红色、蓝色和绿色通道与指定值相乘。

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> structure whose color values are the results of the multiplication operation.
trans-unit.target: 一个新的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> 结构，其颜色值是乘法运算的结果。

trans-unit.source: The first <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> structure to add.
trans-unit.target: 要相加的第一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> 结构。

trans-unit.source: The second <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> structure to add.
trans-unit.target: 要相加的第二个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> 结构。

trans-unit.source: Adds two <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> structures.
trans-unit.target: 将两个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> 结构相加。

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> structure whose color values are the results of the addition operation.
trans-unit.target: 一个新的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> 结构，其颜色值是加法运算的结果。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> structures are added together by adding the alpha, red, green, and blue channels of the first color to the alpha, red, green, and blue channels of the second color.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> 通过将第一种颜色的 alpha、 红色、 绿色和蓝色通道添加到第二种颜色的 alpha、 红色、 绿色和蓝色通道，结构加在一起。

trans-unit.source: For example, the alpha channel of `color1` and the alpha channel of `color2` are added together to produce the alpha channel of the resulting color.
trans-unit.target: 例如的 alpha 通道`color1`和的 alpha 通道`color2`添加在一起以产生所生成的颜色的 alpha 通道。

trans-unit.source: The same is done with the red, green, and blue channels to produce the red, green, and blue channels of the new color.
trans-unit.target: 相同是使用要生成新的颜色的红色、 绿色和蓝色通道的红色、 绿色和蓝色通道进行。

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.Add%28System.Windows.Media.Color%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Color%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: 此运算符的等效方法是 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.Add%28System.Windows.Media.Color%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Color%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: The first <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> structure to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比较的第一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> 结构。

trans-unit.source: The second <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> structure to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比较的第二个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> 结构。

trans-unit.source: Tests whether two <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> structures are identical.
trans-unit.target: 测试两个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> 结构是否相同。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="color1" /> and <paramref name="color2" /> are exactly identical; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="color1" /> 与 <paramref name="color2" /> 完全相同，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Floating-point values can acquire a small degree of error when they are operated upon.
trans-unit.target: 这些运算时，浮点值可以获取轻微的错误。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.Equals%2A> method, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.op_Equality%2A> operator, and the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.op_Inequality%2A> operator do not compensate for this and thus may not return the expected Boolean result.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.Equals%2A>方法，<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.op_Equality%2A>运算符，与<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.op_Inequality%2A>运算符不弥补这并因此可能不会返回预期的布尔值结果。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.AreClose%2A> method uses a fuzzy equality algorithm that compensates for this floating-point arithmetic error by returning `true` for a comparison of two <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> structures that are practically identical, but whose values may differ by a minuscule amount.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.AreClose%2A>方法使用此浮点算术错误补偿通过返回的模糊相等算法`true`有关的两个比较<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color>几乎相同，但其值可能因而异的结构少量。

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.Equals%28System.Windows.Media.Color%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Color%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: 此运算符的等效方法是 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.Equals%28System.Windows.Media.Color%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Color%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: The first <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> structure to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比较的第一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> 结构。

trans-unit.source: The second <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> structure to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比较的第二个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> 结构。

trans-unit.source: Tests whether two <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> structures are not identical.
trans-unit.target: 测试两个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> 结构是否不同。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="color1" /> and <paramref name="color2" /> are not equal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="color1" /> 和 <paramref name="color2" /> 不相等，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> structure whose color values are the results of the multiplication operation.
trans-unit.target: 一个新的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> 结构，其颜色值是乘法运算的结果。

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.Multiply%28System.Windows.Media.Color%2CSystem.Single%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: 此运算符的等效方法是 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.Multiply%28System.Windows.Media.Color%2CSystem.Single%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> structure to be subtracted from.
trans-unit.target: 作为被减数的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> 结构。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> structure to subtract from <c>color1</c>.
trans-unit.target: 要从 <c>color1</c> 中减去的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> 结构。

trans-unit.source: Subtracts a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> structure from a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: 从一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> 结构中减去一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> 结构。

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> structure whose color values are the results of the subtraction operation.
trans-unit.target: 一个新的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> 结构，其颜色值是减法运算的结果。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> structures are subtracted from one another by subtracting the alpha, red, green, and blue channels of the second color from the alpha, red, green, and blue channels of the first color.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> 结构通过减去从第一种颜色的 alpha、 红色、 绿色和蓝色通道的第二个颜色的 alpha、 红色、 绿色和蓝色通道减去从另一个。

trans-unit.source: For example, the alpha channel of `color2` is subtracted from the alpha channel of `color1` to produce the alpha channel of the resulting <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> structure.
trans-unit.target: 例如的 alpha 通道`color2`减去的 alpha 通道`color1`以生成所产生的 alpha 通道<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color>结构。

trans-unit.source: The same is done with the red, green, and blue channels to produce the red, green, and blue channels of the new <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> structure.
trans-unit.target: 相同，可使用要生成新的红色、 绿色和蓝色通道的红色、 绿色和蓝色通道<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color>结构。

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.Subtract%28System.Windows.Media.Color%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Color%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: 此运算符的等效方法是 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.Subtract%28System.Windows.Media.Color%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Color%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see langword="sRGB" /> red channel value of the color.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置颜色的 <see langword="sRGB" /> 红色通道值。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="sRGB" /> red channel value of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> structure, a value between 0 and 255.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> 结构的 <see langword="sRGB" /> 红色通道值，介于 0 到 255 之间。

trans-unit.source: The `sRGB` channels (<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A>) and the `ScRGB` channels (<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScA%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScR%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScG%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScB%2A>) of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> structure are synchronized properties.
trans-unit.target: `sRGB`通道 (<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A>) 和`ScRGB`通道 (<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScA%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScR%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScG%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScB%2A>) 的<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color>结构不是同步的属性。

trans-unit.source: For example, when <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A>, the `sRGB` red channel, is modified, the `ScRGB` red channel, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScR%2A>, is converted to the equivalent value using the 0-1 range that the `Sc` scheme supports.
trans-unit.target: 例如，当<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A>、`sRGB`修改红色通道时，`ScRGB`红色通道<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScR%2A>，转换为等效于使用 0-1 的值范围`Sc`方案支持。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see langword="ScRGB" /> alpha channel value of the color.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置颜色的 <see langword="ScRGB" /> alpha 通道值。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="ScRGB" /> alpha channel value of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> structure, a value between 0 and 1.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> 结构的 <see langword="ScRGB" /> Alpha 通道值，介于 0 和 1 之间。

trans-unit.source: The alpha channel of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> structure determines the amount of transparency the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> has.
trans-unit.target: Alpha 通道<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color>结构确定透明度量<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color>具有。

trans-unit.source: An alpha value of 1 indicates the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> is completely opaque and a value of 0 indicates the color is completely transparent.
trans-unit.target: Alpha 值为 1 指示<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color>完全不透明的 0 值表示的颜色是完全透明。

trans-unit.source: The `sRGB` channels (<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A>) and the `ScRGB` channels (<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScA%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScR%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScG%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScB%2A>) of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> structure are synchronized properties.
trans-unit.target: `sRGB`通道 (<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A>) 和`ScRGB`通道 (<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScA%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScR%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScG%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScB%2A>) 的<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color>结构不是同步的属性。

trans-unit.source: For example, when <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A>, the `sRGB` alpha channel, is modified, the `ScRGB` alpha channel, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScA%2A> is converted to the equivalent value using the 0-1 range that the `Sc` scheme supports.
trans-unit.target: 例如，当<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A>、`sRGB`修改 alpha 通道， `ScRGB` alpha 通道，<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScA%2A>转换为等效于使用 0-1 的值范围`Sc`方案支持。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the ScRGB blue channel value of the color.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置颜色的 ScRGB 蓝色通道值。

trans-unit.source: The ScRGB red channel value of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> structure, a value between 0 and 1.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> 结构的 ScRGB 红色通道值，介于 0 到 1 之间。

trans-unit.source: The `sRGB` channels (<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A>) and the `ScRGB` channels (<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScA%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScR%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScG%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScB%2A>) of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> structure are synchronized properties.

trans-unit.target: 例如，当<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A>、`sRGB`蓝色通道，将修改，`ScRGB`蓝色通道<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScB%2A>，转换为等效于使用 0-1 的值范围`Sc`方案支持。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see langword="ScRGB" /> green channel value of the color.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置颜色的 <see langword="ScRGB" /> 绿色通道值。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="ScRGB" /> green channel value of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> structure, a value between 0 and 1.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="ScRGB" />绿色的通道值<see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" />结构，介于 0 和 1 之间的值。

trans-unit.source: The `sRGB` channels (<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A>) and the `ScRGB` channels (<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScA%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScR%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScG%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScB%2A>) of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> structure are synchronized properties.
trans-unit.target: `sRGB`通道 (<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A>) 和`ScRGB`通道 (<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScA%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScR%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScG%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScB%2A>) 的<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color>结构不是同步的属性。

trans-unit.source: The format to use.
trans-unit.target: 要使用的格式。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: A null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic) to use the default format defined for the type of the <see cref="T:System.IFormattable" /> implementation.
trans-unit.target: null 引用（Visual Basic 中为 <see langword="Nothing" />）将使用为 <see cref="T:System.IFormattable" /> 实现的类型所定义的默认格式。

trans-unit.source: The provider to use to format the value.
trans-unit.target: 要用于对值设置格式的提供程序。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: A null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic) to obtain the numeric format information from the current locale setting of the operating system.
trans-unit.target: null 引用（Visual Basic 中为 <see langword="Nothing" />）将从操作系统的当前区域设置中获取数字格式信息。

trans-unit.source: Formats the value of the current instance using the specified format.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定格式对当前实例的值设置格式。

trans-unit.source: The value of the current instance in the specified format.
trans-unit.target: 采用指定格式的当前实例的值。

trans-unit.source: Creates a string representation of the color by using the <see langword="sRGB" /> channels.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see langword="sRGB" /> 通道创建颜色的字符串表示形式。

trans-unit.source: Creates a string representation of the color using the <see langword="sRGB" /> channels.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see langword="sRGB" /> 通道创建颜色的字符串表示形式。

trans-unit.source: The string representation of the color.
trans-unit.target: 颜色的字符串表示形式。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation represents the <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> values in hex form, prefixes with the <c>#</c> character, and starts with the alpha channel.
trans-unit.target: 默认实现表示十六进制格式的 <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> 值，以 <c>#</c> 字符为前缀，并且以 Alpha 通道开头。

trans-unit.source: For example, the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Media.Color.ToString" /> value for <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Colors.AliceBlue" /> is <c>#FFF0F8FF</c>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Colors.AliceBlue" /> 的 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Media.Color.ToString" /> 值是 <c>#FFF0F8FF</c>。

trans-unit.source: Culture-specific formatting information.
trans-unit.target: 区域性特定的格式设置信息。

trans-unit.source: Creates a string representation of the color by using the <see langword="sRGB" /> channels and the specified format provider.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see langword="sRGB" /> 通道和指定的格式提供程序创建颜色的字符串表示形式。

trans-unit.source: The string representation of the color.
trans-unit.target: 颜色的字符串表示形式。
